sentences.english: His lame is the result of an accident.
sentences.chinese: 他的跛足是一次車禍的結果。

sentences.english: The beggar's limp was a fake.
sentences.chinese: 那乞丐的跛足乃系作僞。

sentences.english: The crippled old man dragged along slowly.
sentences.chinese: 跛足老人拖着沉着的腳步緩慢地往前走。

sentences.english: Her lame foot disqualified her for dance.
The lame child lagged far behind.
sentences.chinese: 那個跛足的孩子遠遠掉在後面。

sentences.english: Will you carry the burden of their lameness ?
sentences.chinese: 你會繼續他們的跛足的負擔呢？

sentences.english: L Help a lame dog over a stile.
sentences.chinese: 幫助跛足的狗越過柵欄。

sentences.english: A bullet lamed the soldier for life.
sentences.chinese: 一粒子彈讓這個士兵一生跛足。

sentences.english: By a fierce sudden cold front on the waist, so I limp a little.
sentences.chinese: 卻在青春期被冷峯擊中了腰，所以我有點跛足。

sentences.english: He was lame, and was wearing a bolero.
sentences.chinese: 他跛足，穿一件無鈕釦的短上衣。

sentences.english: Most owners report the sudden onset of moderate to severe lameness in the cat.
sentences.chinese: 大多數業主報告貓在突發嚴重跛足發病溫和。

sentences.english: Persistent damage or inadequate healing may lead to chronic lameness.
sentences.chinese: 反覆受傷或治療不當可導致長期跛足。

sentences.english: The lame child lagged far behind.
sentences.chinese: 那個跛足的孩子遠遠落在後面。

sentences.english: Help a lame dog over a stile.
sentences.chinese: 幫助跛足的狗越過柵門。

sentences.english: LAME】The soldier is not able to walk normally because he is lame from an old wound.
sentences.chinese: 那士兵因舊傷而跛足，使他無法正常地行走。

definition: to fall down/to take a fall
lit. with disheveled hair and a dirty face/of unkempt appearance (idiom)
to bow/to bend at the waist
